thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Teamsun Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 525 pct to 553 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Teamsun Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 525 pct to 553 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing teamsun technology co ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Beijing Teamsun Technology Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 525 percent to 553 percent, or to be about 225 million yuan to 235 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 36 million yuan
* Comments that increased income of cloud computing products and investment income as well as inclusion of new company as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/jXQAaq
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
